name: Lime Slush
description: Everything about this vape screams slushy. Flv lime is the perfect candied lime for this mix. Oba Oba adds a nice candied sweetness to help sell the slushy feel as does cap hibiscus. Fa mandarin just ads an extra dimension of citrus. Fa sour wizard adds a bit of tang and helps make the lime pop.
author: mlNikon

reviews.text: Perfect recipe to highlight flv lime. I did use ws23 instead of koolada, just to go with the times. Tasty mix.
This is perfect to me. I did used tpa sour in place of fa sour wizard but don't think it matters much.

One week steep.  Heavy lime slushy syrup.  Very authentic just maybe a bit strong.  Spot on flavor though and quite pleasant.  The mouth feel is great.  The only thing I would change is just drop down the volume from a 10 to an 8.
Nice job on this! Very refreshing vape.
